title: KelpstonePlayerUser
description: A set of data exclusive to user profiles for APIs related to the Kelpstone minecraft server.

record.description: A schema-unique identifier for internal databases and body object referencing methods.

allOf.description: (POST Only) A record identifier for UniversalUserIdentifier.

stem.description:
If your using `GET` this will contain a UUI schema, optionally when using `POST` you can reference the record number of the UUI to simply things.

*__Note:__ Changing data inside the `POST`'s `UniversalUserIdentifier` other than the `id` will not having any affects on the record.*

name.description: Customizable identity data containg the Kelpstone exclusive editions of the players name as well as the permenant Mojang-provided name.

birthday.description: Data relating to when the user initaly joined the Kelpfamily of services.
